languages.text: От цепкого взгляда Лорд-капитана не укрылись ржавые бочки с очевидно горючим содержимым, едва заметные среди плотных рядов мятежников. Один точный выстрел по канистрам — и число еретиков на Райкаде Минорис резко сократится.

traits.locale_text: От цепкого взгляда Лорд-капитана не укрылись ржавые бочки с очевидно горючим содержимым, едва заметные среди плотных рядов мятежников. Один точный выстрел по канистрам — и число еретиков на Райкад Минорис резко сократится.

languages.text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.
languages.original_text: От цепкого взгляда Лорд-капитана не укрылись ржавые бочки с очевидно горючим содержимым, едва заметные среди плотных рядов мятежников. Один точный выстрел по канистрам — и число еретиков на Райкаде Минорис резко сократится.

traits.locale_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels, their contents evidently flammable, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would cause the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris to plummet.

Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels, their contents evidently flammable, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would cause the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris to plummet.

Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would plummet the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would plummet the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

languages.text: Die verrosteten Fässer mit offensichtlich brennbarem Inhalt waren hinter den geschlossenen Reihen der Aufständischen zwar kaum zu sehen, doch dem scharfen Auge des Lord Captains waren sie nicht entgangen. Ein gezielter Schuss auf diese Fässer würde die Zahl der Ketzer auf Rykad Minoris deutlich verringern.
languages.original_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

traits.locale_text: Die verrosteten Fässer mit offensichtlich brennbarem Inhalt waren hinter den geschlossenen Reihen der Aufständischen zwar kaum zu sehen, doch dem scharfen Auge des Lord Captains waren sie nicht entgangen. Ein gezielter Schuss auf diese Fässer würde die Zahl der Ketzer auf Rykad Minoris deutlich verringern.

languages.text: À peine visibles derrière les rangs serrés des insurgés, les barils rouillés au contenu manifestement inflammable n'échappent pas aux yeux acérés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Un tir bien ajusté sur ces barils suffirait à réduire très nettement le nombre d'hérétiques sur Rykad Minoris.
languages.original_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

traits.locale_text: À peine visibles derrière les rangs serrés des insurgés, les barils rouillés au contenu manifestement inflammable n'échappent pas aux yeux acérés {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Un tir bien ajusté sur ces barils suffirait à réduire très nettement le nombre d'hérétiques sur Rykad Minoris.

languages.text: 虽然叛乱分子挤在一起，但舰长大人敏锐的双眼还是捕捉了藏在其后的东西。他们身后有几个锈迹斑斑的铁桶，里面显然装着某种可燃物。只要一枪打中那些桶，就可以让小莱卡德的异端分子数量锐减。
languages.original_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

traits.locale_text: 虽然叛乱分子挤在一起，但舰长大人敏锐的双眼还是捕捉了藏在其后的东西。他们身后有几个锈迹斑斑的铁桶，里面显然装着某种可燃物。只要一枪打中那些桶，就可以让小莱卡德的异端分子数量锐减。

languages.text: 密集した反乱軍に隠れてほとんど見えなかったが、ロード・キャプテンの鋭い目は、明らかに可燃物を含む錆びた樽を見逃さなかった。この樽を一発でも撃つことができれば、ライカド・ミノリスの異端者の数は壊滅することだろう。
languages.original_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

traits.locale_text: 密集した反乱軍に隠れてほとんど見えなかったが、ロード・キャプテンの鋭い目は、明らかに可燃物を含む錆びた樽を見逃さなかった。この樽を一発でも撃つことができれば、ライカド・ミノリスの異端者の数は激減することだろう。

languages.text: Los barriles oxidados, con un contenido evidentemente inflamable, apenas visibles tras las filas cerradas de los insurgentes, no habían escapado a la atenta mirada {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. Un buen disparo a esos barriles reduciría considerablemente el número de herejes en Rykad Minoris.
languages.original_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

traits.locale_text: Los barriles oxidados, con un contenido evidentemente inflamable, apenas visibles tras las filas cerradas de los insurgentes, no habían escapado a la atenta mirada {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán. Un buen disparo a esos barriles reduciría el número de herejes en Rykad Minoris.

languages.text: İsyancıların sıkı saflarının arkasında zar zor görülebilmelerine rağmen yanıcı muhteviyata sahip oldukları aşikâr paslı variller, Lord Kaptan'ın keskin gözünden kaçmamıştı. Bu varillere atılacak tek bir mermi, Rykad Minoris'teki kâfir sayısını hayli azaltabilirdi.
languages.original_text: Although barely visible behind the closed ranks of the insurgents, the rusted barrels with evidently flammable contents, had not escaped the Lord Captain's keen eye. One good shot at those barrels would decimate the number of heretics on Rykad Minoris.

traits.locale_text: İsyancıların sıkı saflarının arkasında zar zor görülebilmelerine rağmen yanıcı muhteviyata sahip oldukları aşikâr paslı variller, Lord Kaptan'ın keskin gözünden kaçmamıştı. Bu varillere atılacak tek bir mermi, Rykad Minoris'teki kâfir sayısını hayli azaltabilirdi.
